post.author: 고상호
post.content:
Working with minimal supervision within a highly skilled team of technical and business experts the developer will be involved in analysis, design, development and implementation of different initiatives. This is an opportunity for the right candidate to utilize a variety of skills in the delivery of assignments in the use of selected technology.
Candidate will be responsible for: " Participation in the investigation and provision of solutions for reported production problems. " Participation in the design, development, testing and implementation of application(s) enhancements. " Recommending process and/or development improvements
Requirements " 5+ yrs. Experience in the areas below: " Must have strong skills in OO design & programming, Java, J2EE and XML " Must have working experience with WebLogic application server " Working experience with relational databases (preferable ORACLE, DB2 or MS SQL) " Knowledge of CVS source control tools " Knowledgeable in NT and UNIX environments " Ability to effectively interact with business analysts, support analysts, and clients " Strong written and verbal communication skills. " Creative thinker and problem solver " Strong time management skills
1. Team player 2. Analytical/System Thinker 3. Motivated self starter 4. Problem Solver 5. Good communication - verbal & written
post.title: Job description
